searchSimple

List<com.barchart.feed.api.model.meta.Instrument> searchSimple(String phrase)
                                                               throws Exception
BARCHART simplified search syntax; 0) use "space" as term separator; 1) if "*" or "?" are present, treat term as WILDCARD; 2) else use "term" as prefix; i.e. "term*" 3) combine all terms with "AND";

Throws:
Exception
